songs.title: Dynamite
songs.album: Keeps Gettin’ Better: A Decade of Hits
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Dancin' 'til the morning on a velvet sky
Racing to the top with golden rays of light
I never felt so free and yet so dangerous
The night was electronic, painted red with lust
I move, when you chase, we magnetize
A time bomb was exploding with no warning signs

[Chorus]
Dynamite - electrify me all night
Dynamite - just give it to me, I won't fight
Dynamite - you make me feel, it's alright
Dynamite - shine it on me (starlight)

[Verse 2]
Caught up in this moment, I was hypnotized (hypnotized)
I couldn't shake this feeling, got me paralyzed
I do, I don't, I think I might
My body was electric like a flash of light

[Chorus]
Dynamite - electrify me all night
Dynamite - just give it to me, I won't fight
Dynamite - you make me feel, it's alright
Dynamite - shine it on me (starlight)

[Bridge]
A change, a change is coming
A change, a change is coming
I'm feelin' all around me that a change is 'bout to happen
The energy igniting has become my inspiration
If you take a deeper look, you'll find the information
I'm only just a figment of controlled imagination

[Chorus]
Dynamite - electrify me all night
Dynamite - just give it to me, I won't fight
Dynamite - you make me feel, it's alright
Dynamite - shine it on me (starlight)

[Outro]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, electrify me
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, I won't fight
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, just give it to me
Dancin' 'til the morning on a velvet sky, oh, oh
Dancin' 'til  the morning on a velvet sky, oh, oh
Dancin' 'til the morning on a velvet sky
